channel.title: Change item id's from 1 source to another
channel.description:
Ok so in the current source i have, some items i have are customs, such as d claws and spirit sheilds. I want to be able to switch the character files over without losing the items like d claws or spirit shields, but the other source i want to switch to has different item id's.
Example: D claws item id in current source is: 15027 D claws in the source i want are: 14484
Is there a way to change it so when i switch the character files over, all the 15027 id's switch to 14484?

item.title: Change item id's from 1 source to another
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Hmm so you have some hot shot server? whats it called.

Edit: if you have notepad++ open all the files and replace for all files, you might lag like hell but it’s quicker

Read full topic
